createCollection.description: Create a new collection in your Webflow site.

createdOn.description: The date the collection was created

slug.description: Slug of Collection in Site URL structure

isEditable.description: Define whether the field is editable

isRequired.description: define whether a field is required in a collection

slug.description: Slug of Field in Site URL structure. Slugs should be all lowercase with no spaces. Any spaces will be converted to "-".

type.description: Choose these appropriate field type for your collection data
